mapper.select: WITH CTE AS ( SELECT P.patnt_nm , P.patnt_code, R.rec_code, S.stat_code, S.stat_time, S.fclty_code, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY R.rec_code ORDER BY S.stat_time DESC) AS RN FROM PATIENT P INNER JOIN RECEPTION R ON P.patnt_code = R.patnt_code INNER JOIN PATNT_STAT S ON S.rec_code = R.rec_code ) SELECT patnt_nm "recep.patnt.patntNm", patnt_code "recep.patnt.patntCode", rec_code, stat_code, stat_time, fclty_code FROM CTE WHERE RN = 1 AND FCLTY_CODE = #{fcltyCode} ORDER BY rec_code

WITH CTE AS ( SELECT P.patnt_nm , P.patnt_code, R.rec_code, S.stat_code, S.stat_time, S.fclty_code, M.mdexmn_code, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY R.rec_code ORDER BY S.stat_time DESC) AS RN FROM MDEXMN M INNER JOIN RECEPTION R ON (M.REC_CODE = R.REC_CODE) INNER JOIN PATIENT P ON P.patnt_code = R.patnt_code INNER JOIN PATNT_STAT S ON S.rec_code = R.rec_code ) SELECT patnt_nm "recep.patnt.patntNm", patnt_code "recep.patnt.patntCode", rec_code, stat_code, stat_time, fclty_code, mdexmn_code "recep.mdexmn.mdexmnCode" FROM CTE WHERE RN = 1 ORDER BY rec_code

WITH CTE AS ( SELECT P.patnt_nm , P.patnt_code, R.rec_code, S.stat_code, S.stat_time, S.fclty_code, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY R.rec_code ORDER BY S.stat_time DESC) AS RN FROM PATIENT P INNER JOIN RECEPTION R ON P.patnt_code = R.patnt_code INNER JOIN PATNT_STAT S ON S.rec_code = R.rec_code ) SELECT patnt_nm "recep.patnt.patntNm", patnt_code "recep.patnt.patntCode", rec_code, stat_code, stat_time, fclty_code FROM CTE WHERE RN = 1 ORDER BY STAT_CODE ASC

SELECT EXTRACT(YEAR FROM STAT_TIME) AS YEAR, EXTRACT(MONTH FROM STAT_TIME) AS MONTH, COUNT(*) AS MONTHCOUNT FROM PATNT_STAT GROUP BY EXTRACT(YEAR FROM STAT_TIME), EXTRACT(MONTH FROM STAT_TIME) ORDER BY YEAR, MONTH
SELECT EXTRACT(YEAR FROM STAT_TIME) AS YEAR, COUNT(*) AS YEARCOUNT FROM PATNT_STAT GROUP BY EXTRACT(YEAR FROM STAT_TIME) ORDER BY YEAR
